-spec maximum_sum(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
maximum_sum(Nums) ->
    Pairs = lists:map(fun(X) -> {X, prime_factors_count(X)} end, Nums),
    Groups = lists:foldl(fun({Num, Factors}, Acc) ->
                             maps:fold(fun(K, V, Acc1) -> 
                                           Key = maps:update_with(K, fun(Old) -> Old bxor V end, V, Acc1),
                                           maps:update_with(Key, fun(Old) -> Old + Num end, Num, Acc1)
                                       end, Acc, Factors)
                         end, #{}, Pairs),
    maps:fold(fun(_K, V, Max) -> max(V, Max) end, 0, Groups).

prime_factors_count(N) ->
    prime_factors_count(N, 2, #{}).

prime_factors_count(1, _, Acc) ->
    Acc;
prime_factors_count(N, F, Acc) when N rem F == 0 ->
    NewAcc = maps:update_with(F, fun(Old) -> Old + 1 end, 1, Acc),
    prime_factors_count(N div F, F, NewAcc);
prime_factors_count(N, F, Acc) ->
    prime_factors_count(N, F + 1, Acc).
